name: Dragon Tail Gramel
desc:
1 "Dragon Tail" monster + 1 monster in the hand
When you activate a "Dragon Tail" card or effect (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. If 2 or more monsters are sent to the GY at the same time while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Dragon Tail Gramel" once per turn.
